Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.client
     
  • Class
    Description
    BoardView
    This class is used to print the board in the cli
    BookshelfView
    This class is used to print the bookshelf in the cli
    CommonGoalView
    This class is used to print the common goal in the cli
    EndGameGuiController
    This class is the controller for the end game gui.
    GameCliView
    This class handles the CLI view of the game.
    GameGuiController
    This class is the controller for the main game scene.
    GameView
    This is the interface used for the view (cli or gui)
    GuiView
    This class is the GUI view, it extends Application and implements GameView.
    ItemView
    This class is used to print the items in the cli.
    LoginGuiController
    This is the controller for the login gui.
    PersonalGoalView
    This class is used to print the personal goal card in the cli.
    PlayerSelectionGuiController
    This class is the controller for the player selection Gui.
    RefusedGuiController
    This class is the controller for the refused gui, in case there are too many players who want to play.
    WaitingRoomController
    This class is the controller for the waiting room scene, since it's a static scene it doesn't have any methods.
